DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study (*) is to evaluate the progression free survival rate at 6 months, response rate, overall disease control rate, overall survival of BAY-43-9006 in soft tissue sarcoma patients. (*) as per Protocol Amendment No. 1 of 16 April 2007 approved by local IEC on 24 July 2007
DOC.brief_title: BAY-43-9006 in Advanced, Metastatic Soft Tissue Sarcomas
DOC.criteria: Histologically documented, progressive, advanced or metastatic sarcoma after adjuvant and/or first line anthracyclinebased regimen; age >=18 yrs; ECOG PS =2; at least 1 measurable target lesion; life expectancy >=12 wks; adequate medullary liver and renal function; written informed consent. metastatic brain disease; pregnant or breastfeeding patients; serious infections.
